channel.title: Undo a hosted server? if u help you are pro =]
channel.description:
well, it starts like this: Some idiot posted their server in the "server downloads" section, but it connects to his server...lol...i mean, instead of it just running on your computer, he is hosting it and it connects to his...ip..or what ever. so how do i make it NOT connect to his thing... do i have to delete some files or something? what all do i need to change/get rid of to make it like any other server, and only connect to 'localhost' aka your computer...im bad at explaining shiz so bare wit my plz :confused:
(so basicly, if you know how to host a server, tell me everything you do and edit and then i will undo it and what not...) things i see on here that are not normally on other servers is: deps folder: jython, log4j-1.2.15, mina-core-1.1.7, slf4j-api-1.5.3.... tons of .xml files, i am assuming has something to do with the internet, so the files are probably hosted on a site... stuff like that...what the hell is all that??

item.title: Undo a hosted server? if u help you are pro =]
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“lary370, post:3, topic:333529”]FIRST CHECK IF THERE ARE ANY JAVA FILES… IF NOT YOU NEED TO DE-COMPILE (SEARCH ON GOOGLE IDK HOW)
IF THERE IS LOOK IN CLIENT.JAVA AND EGUI.JAVA OR GUI.JAVA SOME OF THOSE[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Undo a hosted server? if u help you are pro =]
